bbp_code_package.nodes.statistical_analysis.statistical_analysis_utils.get_cols_from_feat_markers(df, features_markers)[source]¶

List columns with a specific marker :param df: Dataframe whose columns needs to be filtered :param features_markers: List of markers (‘strings’) to be used for extraction :return: List of columns containing at least one of the markers

bbp_code_package.nodes.statistical_analysis.statistical_analysis_utils.get_html_box_plot(df, cols_to_analyse, colour_col, savepath, savefile)[source]¶

Plot scattermatrix HTML file over defined dict

Parameters

  • df (DataFrame) – data to plot

  • cols_to_analyse – columns to be analysed

  • colour_col (str) – col used to group data

  • savepath (str) – path to savefolder

  • savefile (str) – Path to save sub-file

Returns

Html Box plot of each of the cols_to_analyse, saved in the indicated folder
